TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SendPacketsElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 数组中的一个元素。

span.span: Represents an element in a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于增强异步网络 I/O 用于实现最高性能的服务器应用程序使用的类。The class is used to enhance the class for use by server applications that use asynchronous network I/O to achieve the highest performance. 类用于属性来获取或设置数据缓冲区或待发送文件使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

threadsafe.span: 此类的实例都是线程安全。

span.span: Instances of this class are thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的新实例文件的文件名的类。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class with a filename of a file. 类用于属性来获取或设置数据缓冲区或待发送文件使用方法。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method. 支持通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径`filepath`参数。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the `filepath` parameter. 如果文件在当前工作目录中，需要指定没有路径信息。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified.

span.span: The parameter cannot be null

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要用 方法发送的数据的字节数组。

span.span: A byte array of data to send using the method.

param.name: offset
param.span: 以字节为单位表示的偏移量，该偏移量是指 buffer 的起始位置与 buffer 中开始发送 buffer 参数中指定数据的位置之间的偏移。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer to the location in the buffer to start sending the data specified in the buffer parameter.

param.name: count
param.span: 从 offset 参数开始发送的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes to send starting from the offset parameter.

param.span: 如果 count 为零，则不发送任何字节。

span.span: If count is zero, no bytes are sent.

param.span: 以字节为单位表示的偏移量，该偏移量是指 buffer 的起始位置与 buffer 中开始发送 buffer 参数中指定数据的位置之间的偏移。

param.name: endOfPacket
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指定此元素不应与从套接字层到传输层的单一发送请求中的下一个元素合并。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies that this element should not be combined with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.

param.span: 此标志用于精细控制数据报或面向消息的套接字中每个消息的内容。

span.span: This flag is used for granular control of the content of each message on a datagram or message-oriented socket.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified buffer, buffer offset, and count with an option to combine this element with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.
